summary.executive_summary: ADP SecurTime is a comprehensive workforce management solution that provides real-time attendance tracking, biometric authentication, and integrated time and payroll management across diverse work environments.
summary.detailed_summary: ADP SecurTime is a cloud-based time and attendance platform designed to help organizations efficiently manage employee scheduling, attendance, and productivity. The solution offers advanced features like biometric authentication, geo-tracking, mobile app access, and integration with payroll systems, enabling businesses to reduce time fraud, optimize workforce management, and ensure compliance across various industries and work arrangements.
summary.comprehensive_summary: ADP SecurTime is a robust workforce management platform addressing time tracking, attendance, and payroll challenges. Key features include real-time attendance tracking, biometric authentication (facial recognition, fingerprint), mobile and tablet apps, geo-fencing, and industry-specific solutions. The platform supports diverse workforce types including full-time, part-time, contract, and gig workers across industries like manufacturing, healthcare, banking, and construction. It offers advanced capabilities such as automated shift scheduling, leave management, overtime tracking, and seamless payroll integration, with a strong emphasis on data privacy and security.
key_points: Real-time attendance tracking with biometric authentication
Mobile and tablet apps with geo-tracking capabilities
Supports diverse workforce types and multiple industries
Automated shift scheduling and leave management
Seamless payroll integration and compliance support
Advanced security with AWS cloud infrastructure
Reduces time fraud and improves workforce productivity
summary.tagline: Get the right people in the right place, at the right time for the right cost
summary.value_proposition: ADP SecurTime simplifies workforce management by providing accurate, real-time attendance tracking, reducing time fraud, and enabling organizations to optimize productivity across diverse work environments.

features.name: Real-time Attendance Tracking
features.description: Provides single, accurate, real-time view of employee attendance, performance, productivity, cost and compliance
features.technical_details: Real-time data processing and visualization

features.name: Biometric Authentication
features.description: Multiple biometric options including facial recognition, fingerprint, and RFID for secure time recording
features.technical_details: Supports RFID, fingerprint, and facial recognition technologies

features.name: Advanced Facial Recognition
features.description: Contactless facial recognition with mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning capabilities
features.technical_details: Includes mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning

features.name: Mobile App with GPS Tracking
features.description: Cloud-based mobile application with geo-tagging, geo-fencing, and live tracking capabilities
features.technical_details: Available on Android and iOS, includes IMEI tagging to prevent proxy attendance

features.name: Geo-fencing and Geo-tagging
features.description: Location-based attendance capture with geographic restrictions and location tracking
benefits: Ensures employees are at correct locations
features.technical_details: GPS-based location verification with customizable geographic boundaries

features.name: Automated Shift Scheduling
features.description: Auto shift scheduling based on employee availability, skill set, and business criteria
features.technical_details: Automated scheduling algorithms with shift cut-off, shift rotation, and on-call tracking

features.description: Comprehensive leave management with policy definition, approval workflows, and real-time tracking
features.technical_details: Configurable leave policies for different employee groups with mobile approval capabilities

features.name: Overtime Management
features.description: Automatic overtime calculation and policy enforcement with real-time monitoring
features.technical_details: Customizable overtime policies for specific employee groups with automatic calculation

features.technical_details: Time allocation tracking with client and project categorization

features.name: Role-based Dashboards
features.description: Different dashboard views and access levels based on user roles in the organization
features.technical_details: Customizable dashboards with role-based access control

features.name: Approval Workflows
features.description: Configurable workflows for different tasks requiring supervisor approval
features.technical_details: Workflow engine with configurable approval chains

features.name: Employee Self-Service
features.description: Employees can view attendance data, apply for leaves, and access personal information
features.technical_details: Self-service portal with mobile access

features.name: Payroll Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with ADP Vista Payroll and other payroll systems
features.technical_details: Direct integration with ADP Vista Payroll and other leading payroll systems

features.name: Multi-location Support
features.description: Manage workforce across 1,000+ distributed locations
features.technical_details: Cloud-based architecture supporting 1,000+ locations

features.name: Irregularity Detection
features.description: Automatically detects attendance irregularities and prevents unauthorized entries
features.technical_details: Automated data cross-referencing and anomaly detection

features.name: Customizable Reports
features.description: Meticulous audits and customizable reports for labor costs and attendance analytics
features.technical_details: Customizable report builder with various output formats

features.name: Tablet App for Shared Devices
features.description: Tablet application allowing multiple employees to authenticate using a single device
features.technical_details: Multi-user authentication on single device with geofencing

features.name: Web Punch
features.description: Web-based attendance marking for on-premise and work-from-home employees
features.technical_details: Web-based application with cloud storage

features.name: BYOD Integration
features.description: Integration with existing biometric devices and systems
features.technical_details: Plug-and-play integration with existing biometric systems

features.name: Employee Communication Hub
features.description: Communication features including HR questions, expense management, and surveys
features.technical_details: Integrated communication platform with multiple service modules

features.name: Front Camera Self-Validation
features.description: Mobile app feature using front camera for employee identity validation
features.technical_details: Front-facing camera facial recognition with IMEI tagging

features.name: Live Attendance Alerts
features.description: Real-time alerts and notifications for attendance events
features.technical_details: Real-time notification system with configurable alert rules

features.name: Shift Bidding and Acceptance
features.description: Transparent shift bidding system allowing employees to bid for preferred shifts
features.technical_details: Automated bidding system with transparent allocation rules

features.description: Track and manage on-call schedules and activities
features.technical_details: On-call schedule management with automatic tracking

features.name: Employee Group-based Policies

features.description: Comprehensive support including L1 helpdesk, L2/L3 technical support, and remote management

benefits.headline: Stop revenue loss from time fraud and ghost employees
benefits.description: Eliminate time fraud that costs up to 5% of gross payroll through biometric authentication and real-time tracking. Prevent ghost employee fraud that affects 29% of businesses with secure, verified attendance recording.
proof_points: Time fraud can cost businesses up to 5% of gross payroll
29% of all businesses are affected by ghost employee fraud
A worker 10 minutes late daily costs 40 hours of mistaken pay per year
benefits.business_impact: Direct payroll cost savings, improved profit margins, reduced financial risk

benefits.headline: Reduce time tracking errors by 30% with automated systems
benefits.description: Replace error-prone manual processes with automated time collection and tracking. Eliminate calculation mistakes and ensure accurate payroll processing with seamless integration to payroll systems.
proof_points: Reduce time tracking errors by 30% on average with Time & Attendance tracking system
benefits.business_impact: Reduced payroll errors, lower administrative costs, improved compliance

benefits.headline: Manage distributed workforce across 1,000+ locations in real-time
benefits.description: Get instant visibility into attendance, productivity, and compliance across vast distributed teams. Track on-premise, remote, and mobile employees from a single platform with geo-fencing and location-based reporting.
proof_points: Client rating of 4 out of 5 stars
benefits.business_impact: Improved operational efficiency, better resource allocation, enhanced productivity oversight

benefits.headline: Recover 35.5% productivity loss from unplanned absences
benefits.description: Gain real-time visibility into attendance patterns and receive instant alerts for absences. Optimize shift scheduling and resource allocation to minimize disruption from unplanned absences.
proof_points: Businesses suffer 35.5% loss in productivity from unplanned absenteeism on average
benefits.business_impact: Increased productivity, better customer service continuity, optimized staffing costs

benefits.headline: Ensure labor law compliance and control overtime costs automatically
benefits.description: Automatically calculate hours worked and apply overtime rules specific to your business and locations. Get timely visibility into approaching overtime to adjust schedules proactively and maintain compliance.
proof_points: Complying with labour laws and controlling overtime costs are two of the biggest benefits
benefits.business_impact: Reduced compliance risk, controlled labor costs, avoided penalties and legal issues

benefits.headline: Deploy without infrastructure investment using cloud-based solution
benefits.description: Get started immediately with cloud-based deployment that requires no additional infrastructure investment. Scale as needed with pay-as-you-go pricing and integrate existing biometric devices.
proof_points: Get on-cloud without additional investments to your infrastructure
benefits.business_impact: Lower upfront costs, faster deployment, reduced IT overhead, flexible scaling

benefits.headline: Streamline payroll processing with seamless integration
benefits.description: Eliminate manual data entry and reduce payroll processing time with direct integration between time tracking and payroll systems. Ensure accurate, timely paychecks while reducing administrative burden.
proof_points: Save admin time and simplify your payroll
Meet employee expectations for timely, error-free paychecks
benefits.business_impact: Reduced payroll processing costs, improved employee satisfaction, faster payroll cycles

benefits.headline: Enable contactless attendance with advanced health safety features
benefits.description: Protect employee health with contactless facial recognition, temperature detection, thermal scanning, and mask detection. Maintain workplace safety while ensuring accurate attendance tracking.
proof_points: Advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning
benefits.business_impact: Enhanced workplace safety, reduced health risks, maintained productivity during health concerns

use_cases.title: Manufacturing Shift Management
use_cases.scenario: Manufacturing companies with mixed workforce (full-time, part-time, rotating shifts, on-call) need to manage complex scheduling and track attendance across multiple production lines
use_cases.problem_solved: Complex scheduling processes, time fraud, manual attendance tracking errors, and difficulty managing dynamic shift schedules
use_cases.solution_approach: Automated shift scheduling based on employee availability and skills, biometric attendance tracking, real-time monitoring, and integration with payroll systems

use_cases.title: Construction Site Workforce Tracking
use_cases.scenario: Construction companies managing workers across multiple remote job sites with varying schedules, compliance requirements, and safety protocols
use_cases.problem_solved: Manual recording errors, difficulty tracking remote workers, safety compliance, labor law adherence, and budget management challenges
use_cases.solution_approach: Mobile app with GPS tracking, geo-fencing for site boundaries, automated time tracking, project-based billing, and real-time attendance monitoring

use_cases.title: Healthcare Staff Rostering
use_cases.scenario: Healthcare organizations managing doctors, nurses, and support staff across multiple departments with complex shift patterns and patient care requirements
use_cases.problem_solved: Complex rostering, attendance fraud, ensuring adequate staffing levels, managing on-call schedules, and maintaining patient care standards
use_cases.solution_approach: Automated shift scheduling considering patient needs, biometric attendance with contactless options, shift cut-off management, and real-time alerts for absences

use_cases.title: Transport & Logistics Fleet Management
use_cases.scenario: Transport companies managing drivers, dispatchers, and support staff across 1000+ distributed locations with varying schedules and route requirements
use_cases.problem_solved: Difficulty tracking mobile workforce, optimizing routes, managing distributed operations, and ensuring accurate time recording at checkpoints
use_cases.solution_approach: GPS-enabled mobile tracking, geo-tagging at checkpoints, optimized scheduling for drivers and dispatchers, and real-time location monitoring

use_cases.title: Banking Field Staff Management
use_cases.scenario: Banking and financial services organizations managing collection and sales employees who visit customers across geographically dispersed locations
use_cases.problem_solved: Tracking field employees, ensuring presence at client locations, optimizing routes, and maintaining productivity standards
use_cases.solution_approach: GPS-based geo-tagging to verify location presence, route optimization, role-based access control, and real-time activity monitoring

use_cases.title: Retail Multi-Store Operations
use_cases.scenario: Retail chains managing employees across multiple store locations with different departments, tight schedules, and high customer service demands
use_cases.problem_solved: Employee attendance disruptions affecting customer service, managing multiple locations, preventing time fraud, and reducing HR administrative load
use_cases.solution_approach: Employee-to-store mapping using geo-fencing, punch alerts based on shifts, biometric authentication, and automated attendance tracking

use_cases.title: Professional Services Project Billing
use_cases.scenario: IT services and consulting companies need to track time spent by employees on different client projects and ensure accurate billing
use_cases.problem_solved: Inaccurate client billing, difficulty tracking project hours, managing shift-based projects, and monitoring overtime compliance
use_cases.solution_approach: Project-based time tracking against clients and activities, shift scheduling for projects, overtime monitoring, and automated billing integration

use_cases.title: Remote Workforce Management
use_cases.scenario: Companies with distributed teams including on-premise, remote, and field employees across multiple geographic locations
use_cases.problem_solved: Managing diverse work arrangements, preventing time fraud, tracking productivity across locations, and maintaining compliance
use_cases.solution_approach: Multi-platform attendance options (mobile, web, biometric), geo-fencing and geo-tagging, real-time monitoring, and centralized cloud-based management

differentiators.claim: Comprehensive biometric ecosystem with advanced health screening
differentiators.explanation: Combines traditional attendance tracking with health safety features like mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning - critical for post-pandemic workplace safety
evidence: Advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning
Contactless capability is also critically important to workplace hygiene and safety including sanitation, social distancing and psychological safety

differentiators.claim: Unified platform for all workforce types across unlimited locations
differentiators.explanation: Single platform manages full-time, part-time, contract, gig and contingent employees across 1,000+ locations with real-time visibility
evidence: Whether they're on-premise, remote, or feet-on-street employees, ADP SecurTime helps you manage productivity of your employees across 1,000+ locations
Tailored for your organisation, SecurTime helps you track and manage your full-time, part-time, contract, gig and contingent employees real-time

differentiators.claim: Plug-and-play integration with existing biometric infrastructure
differentiators.explanation: Can integrate with clients' existing biometric devices without requiring complete system replacement, reducing implementation costs and complexity
evidence: We can integrate the devices you're already using

Our ADP SecurTime system integration partners help our clients adopt cloud-based time attendance systems without replacing current biometric systems using ADP SecurTime's plug-n-play, cloud-based time attendance platform

differentiators.explanation: Tailored solutions for specific industries like construction, healthcare, manufacturing with specialized features for each sector's unique challenges
evidence: Whether it's managing your staff efficiently, dealing with a distributed, mobile workforce, managing a diverse group of workers or simplifying your payroll, your challenges depend on your industry
Shift cut off to identify the prior day night shift and current day shift, on-call tracking for doctor visits beyond shift times

differentiators.claim: Advanced fraud prevention with multiple authentication layers
differentiators.explanation: Prevents time fraud, ghost employees, and proxy attendance through biometric authentication, geo-fencing, IMEI tagging, and real-time cross-referencing
evidence: Stop time leakage, time fraud and ghost employees
Our mobile app allows only one person to authenticate themselves using a single device. This is made possible by leveraging IMEI number tagging and which prevents proxy
ADP SecurTime automatically detects irregularities, cross-references data, and prevents unauthorized entries
compared_to: Basic time tracking systems vulnerable to fraud

unique_capabilities: Mask detection and temperature screening in biometric devices
IMEI number tagging to prevent proxy attendance
Plug-and-play integration with existing biometric infrastructure
Unified platform for all employee types (full-time, part-time, contract, gig, contingent)
Shift cut-off and on-call tracking for healthcare
competitive_analysis.market_position: Comprehensive workforce management platform for diverse, distributed workforces with advanced biometric capabilities and industry-specific solutions
competitive_advantages: Support for unlimited geographic locations and workforce types
